title: simple python client
description:
I've had this python client lying around for almost a year,  used for various little testing scenarios.
It really doesn't do all that much except for connection handling (persistent/non-persistent) and some protocol handling.
Agile languages like Python and Ruby need less in any case.

comments.author: Yonik Seeley
comments.content: Unless someone has a better starting point for a python client, I'll commit this one to clients/python and we can go from there.
